paragraphs: I'm a passionate backend developer specializing in designing and implementing scalable, high-performance server-side applications. I build efficient APIs, robust databases, and reliable backend systems that power modern web and mobile applications.
I follow clean architecture principles and performance optimization strategies, ensuring applications can scale seamlessly while maintaining maintainable, high-quality code and system reliability.

highlights.title: Backend Development
highlights.description: Developing scalable and performant server-side applications using Node.js, TypeScript, Python, and modern frameworks like Express and Fastify.

highlights.title: API Design & Microservices
highlights.description: Designing well-structured RESTful and GraphQL APIs with proper documentation, testing, and microservices architecture for scalable backend systems.

highlights.title: System Architecture & Cloud
highlights.description: Building scalable databases, microservices, and cloud infrastructure (AWS, Docker) for enterprise-grade applications.
